Uses of Class
com.github.macgregor.alexandria.maven.AlexandriaMojo

    • Uses of AlexandriaMojo in com.github.macgregor.alexandria.maven

      Subclasses of AlexandriaMojo in com.github.macgregor.alexandria.maven 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConvertMojo
      mvn alexandria:convert Executes AlexandriaConvert.convert() during the LifecyclePhase.PACKAGE phase
      class  IndexMojo
      mvn alexandria:index Executes AlexandriaIndex.update() during the LifecyclePhase.PREPARE_PACKAGE phase
      class  SyncMojo
      mvn alexandria:sync Executes AlexandriaSync.syncWithRemote() during the LifecyclePhase.DEPLOY phase
      Methods in com.github.macgregor.alexandria.maven that return AlexandriaMojo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.alexandria(Alexandria alexandria) 
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.configPath(String configPath)
      Path to the Alexandria Config file to load/save to, generally .alexandria in the project execution root directory.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.disclaimerFooterEnabled(boolean disclaimerFooterEnabled)
      Whether Alexandria should add a footer to all converted files warning readers they are not reading the source document.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.disclaimerFooterPath(String disclaimerFooterPath)
      Optional path to a custom (markdown) file to use as the footer added to documents.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.excludes(List<String> excludes)
      File exclude glob patterns to use when searching for documents to index.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.failBuild(boolean failBuild)
      Whether or not to fail the overall maven build if the plugin execution fails.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.includes(List<String> includes)
      File include glob patterns to use when searching for documents to index.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.inputs(List<String> inputs)
      Paths to use when searching for documents to index.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.mavenSession(org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession mavenSession)
      Automatically set by Maven, user cannot override.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.outputPath(String outputPath)
      Path to output converted documents to.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.project(org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project)
      Automatically set by Maven, user cannot override.
      AlexandriaMojo AlexandriaMojo.timeout(Integer timeout)
      Timeout in seconds for each rest call to the remote.
